rooms.description: Small foyer with built-in storage, incorporating Vastu-aligned entrance facing east for prosperity and positive energy.
Open-plan living area with Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and metallic accents, Vastu principles ensure seating is placed in the south-east quadrant for relaxation.
Compact yet functional kitchen designed with a U-shaped layout for efficiency and Vastu compliance by placing sink in the north-east, ensuring positive flow.
Adjacent to the kitchen with minimalistic Art Deco design and Vastu-compliant seating arrangement in the north-west for clarity of mind.
Studio area that serves as a living/work space with Vastu-aligned placement for creativity and productivity. Features modular furniture to maximize utility.
Compact bathroom with essential fixtures designed following Vastu principles by avoiding water flowing directly into the house entrance. Minimalistic decor maintains Art Deco aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entrance door, designed with Art Deco details and positioned in the eastern corner to harness positive energy.
Art Deco styled windows placed along the living room and kitchen, ensuring ample natural light while respecting Vastu guidelines.
Side entrance door to a two-car garage located along the west edge of the property.
A staircase or lift access leading to the rooftop terrace, integrated into the design for seamless movement.

additional_features.description: Spacious rooftop terrace designed with Art Deco aesthetics and natural materials, featuring seating areas and minimalistic landscaping to enhance relaxation and positive energy.
A compact private gym integrated within the studio area on a separate floor or as an extension of the multipurpose space. Equipment is chosen for space efficiency and Art Deco finishes.

Dedicated two-car garage positioned at the corner of the plot with easy access to both ground and elevated levels, designed to save space and cost while ensuring Vastu compliance by placing vehicles in the west for stability.
